[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib

open Nat

abbrev omnimath1775_answer : ℕ := sorry
theorem omnimath1775 : 
  let radicalNumbers := {n : ℕ | 1 < n ∧ Nat.Prime (2^n - 1)}
  let sortedRadicals := (radicalNumbers ∩ Set.Icc 2 5000).toFinite.toFinset.sort (· ≤ ·)
  sortedRadicals.get? 19 = some omnimath1775_answer := by sorry. Enumerated answers: Checking n=2, 2^2 - 1 = 3
Found prime: 3
Checking n=3, 2^3 - 1 = 7
Found prime: 7
Checking n=5, 2^5 - 1 = 31
Found prime: 31
Checking n=7, 2^7 - 1 = 127
Found prime: 127
Checking n=13, 2^13 - 1 = 8191
Found prime: 8191
Checking n=17, 2^17 - 1 = 131071
Found prime: 131071

Found prime: 524287

Found prime: 2147483647

Found prime: 2305843009213693951
